content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Apr 2019Why are there so many people selling their investment strategies online claiming to have insane returns? If their strategies are so good why not just sell them to hedge funds and make millions?2 answersAnswerBump0

Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 21 Apr 2019I always like to think the insane returns they are making is largely from selling said courses ;)0 comments1

Ashley Wong, Financial Assistant at Multi Management & Future SolutionsLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 05 Apr 2019Very genuine question. It is a very common scenario today. With so many people selling their investment strategies, it really becomes difficult to find who is the best among them. I agree they should sell their strategies to hedge funds to make millions. One of the reasons they avoid doing it is because they are actually not sure about their own strategies. They are just there to make easy money by fooling others that their strategies are great for others and they should buy it.0 comments0
